definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Svenska Handelsbanken Capital Markets cut its profitability target for the world’s biggest maker of mobile networks.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典商业银行资本市场下调了爱立信的利润预期。

sentences.english: Instead, Ericsson (ERIC) formed its partnership with Sony (SNE).
sentences.chinese: 取而代之，爱立信宣布了它与索尼的合作关系。

sentences.english: As NSN and Ericsson pulled back, Huawei's business grew.
sentences.chinese: NSN和爱立信逐步撤离之后，华为的业务得以增长。

sentences.english: Ericsson is looking forward to meet the challenges and win the future together with Cable & Media customers.
sentences.chinese: 爱立信希望和广电客户一起携手迎接挑战，同创未来。

sentences.english: It is currently tested on SonyEricsson, Nokia and Motorola platforms.
sentences.chinese: 目前它正在测试索尼爱立信，诺基亚和摩托罗拉平台。

definition: China Telecom (Chinese company providing mobile phone service)
operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
